lead_paragraph: The drug company said it paid about $20 million to 4,500 doctors and other professionals for consulting and speaking on its behalf.
snippet: The drug company said it paid about $20 million to 4,500 doctors and other professionals for consulting and speaking on its behalf.

headline.main: Pfizer Gives Details on Payments to Doctors
headline.seo: Pfizer Details Payments to Doctors and Researchers
